

Code for Real dataset
CVPR 2012 Paper A Theory of Multi-Layer Flat Refractive Geometry

Author: Amit Agrawal


Tested on Windows 7 with Matlab R2010b



---Mex calibrated_fivepoint_helper on your machine to get the mex file if there is any problems



To run at Matlab command prompt type 


> ProcessRealData

This code will use a non-planar calibration grid (e.g. two or more checkerboards) for calibration


> ProcessRealDataPlanarGrid

This code will use a planar calibration grid (e.g. single checkerboard) for calibration


Requirements: Matlab Camera Calibration Toolbox should be installed
